display_long_description:
Step into the boots of a lone gunslinger in this tactical Wild West VR shooter. Every level offers something new. Whether you're outsmarting bandits or saving hostages in a dusty desert town, your aim, timing, and tactics decide who survives the showdown.

Features : 

Unique stealth mechanics using your trusty mirror (Ojo Mágico) to spot enemies around corners without exposing yourself
[media]

Use explosions, traps, and strategy — not just bullets

[media]
Story-driven with humorous sheriff missions introducing each level.
[media]
First-person Western action game built for VR

[media]
Casual pacing, but rewarding for sharpshooters and sneaky players alike

Stylized low-poly visuals with gritty cowboy charm

[media]



Perfect for fans of:
Outlaw shooter VR, Western stealth game, VR cowboy shooter, story-driven cowboy VR, and Wild West sniper VR experiences.


Join our Discord server
https://discord.gg/Be4fR3Pn
